description.budget: Manage the distribution of your expenses visually.
description.subscription: Manage the distribution of your subscriptions visually.

description.setting: Manage your account settings and preferences.
description.appearance: Choose your preferred language and color mode.
description.language: Choose the language you want to use in the dashboard.
description.theme: Choose the color theme you want to use in the dashboard.

input.incomeMinOne: Please add at least one income source to proceed to the next step.
input.incomeInput: Please fill in all fields to proceed to the next step.
input.categoryInput: Please fill in all category name fields to add an expense source.
input.expenseInput: Please fill in all fields to add an expense source.
input.expenseMinOne: Please add at least one expense source to proceed to the next step.

update.title: Updating your budget.
update.description: You can now easily adjust your income and expense categories, offering more flexibility in managing your monthly budget.
update.error: An error occurred while saving the changes.

delete.title: Deleting your budget
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete your budget? This action is irreversible, and all associated data will be lost.
delete.success: Your budget has been deleted successfully.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the budget.

add.success: The budget has been added successfully.
add.error: An error occurred while adding the budget.

description.yourSubscriptions: Manage the distribution of your subscriptions visually.
description.emptySubscriptions: No subscriptions scheduled for this date.

input.emptyInput: Please fill in all available fields.

add.title: Adding a new subscription.
add.description: You can now easily add a subscription.
add.success: The subscription has been added successfully.
add.error: An error occurred while adding the subscription.

update.title: Updating your subscription.
update.description: You can now easily update your subscription.
update.error: An error occurred while saving the changes.

delete.title: Deleting your subscription
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete your subscription? This action is irreversible, and all associated data will be lost.
delete.success: Your subscription has been deleted successfully.
delete.error: An error occurred while deleting the subscription.
